TopicTitle: Live Stream: The Kerbin Misison Academy...and other stuff !

Articles.Content:
Greetings,

I will be updating my active live stream times and dates here, and whenever I am running the 'REAL' Kerbin Mission where Kerbals actually can, become paydirt...but we hope that dont happen and make every effort to prevent this - we still have yet to work on the safety mission training !!!!!!!

For now the verious Kerbal engineers want to hoop it up and listen to musik...I play guitar and JAM to the various youtube and radio streams on a whim basis what you hear is what you get so yeah I do make a few booboos - but the Kerbals LUV IT !

So why not...sometimes you just gots to give your brain a rest...

This would be generally off-topic; however I do try to stop playin at some point and get back to rocket design (!); although the first nite went 4 hours...straight!

I like all kinds of music and may even take requests; but I get bored quickly too and may change songs on a whim; Kerbals dont like spur of the moment changes; they are a slow folk like me even.

But after a good JAM...the rockets seem to fly higher !

I have started the 'Kerbin Mission' fan-works thread where I will be posting the mission story...and nice to say that music is part of it ! In fact, have you ever seen that Penguin movie (?)...what happy feet ... I have one Kerbal who is kind of a nut case, and I misplaced him...can you guess who it mite be?

Well he wrote a suggestion to me, then promptly dissappeared...perhaps more info is in my fan-works thread...?

So if you like good musik and want to relax b4 working on that special roket...visit:

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta

I will be on tonite...I had great success with my roket design so I need to work on that tonite while I think of it...later on !

Cdr Zeta
